plan1.name: Starter Plan
plan1.description: Designed for individuals, startups, or small businesses who need a basic online presence.

features.cms: Basic CMS (WordPress, etc.) with user training
features.contact_form: Simple contact form with standard fields
features.seo: Basic on-page SEO for key pages
features.hosting_and_domain_setup: Assistance with hosting setup and domain configuration
features.security: SSL installation and basic security measures
features.support: 1 month of support for minor bug fixes and questions

plan2.name: Business Plan
plan2.description: Targeted at medium-sized businesses looking for more customization and advanced features.

features.design: Custom design reflecting client branding with UX optimization
features.cms: Advanced CMS with more customization (WordPress, Joomla, etc.)
features.seo: Full on-page SEO for all pages with keyword research
features.contact_form: Advanced forms with conditional fields and file uploads
features.ecommerce: Basic e-commerce for up to 10 products
features.hosting_and_domain_setup: Setup for premium hosting and SSL
features.security: Advanced security with firewall, daily backups, and malware scanning
features.analytics: Google Analytics with event tracking and monthly reports
features.content_creation: Basic content writing for up to 5 pages

plan3.name: Enterprise Plan
plan3.description: Built for large businesses and enterprises requiring custom development, complex integrations, and high-level support.

features.design: Fully bespoke design with custom animations and interactions
features.cms: Custom or advanced CMS with multiple user roles
features.custom_functionality: Custom web applications and third-party integrations
features.seo: Comprehensive SEO strategy with technical and off-page SEO
features.performance_optimization: CDN integration and advanced caching techniques
features.security: Enterprise-level security with WAF, DDoS protection, and daily backups
features.analytics_and_reporting: Enhanced analytics, A/B testing, and monthly reports
features.dedicated_support: 6-12 months of ongoing support with a dedicated account manager
features.custom_integrations: Integration with internal systems (CRM, ERP, etc.)
